summary: UEFA Euro 2024 - The UEFA European Football Championship 2024, commonly referred to as UEFA Euro 2024 or simply Euro 2024, is the 17th edition of the quadrennial international men's football championship of Europe organized by the Union of European Football Associations (UEFA). The tournament is scheduled to take place in Germany from June 14 to July 14, 2024. This marks the third time Germany will host the event, though it is the first time since reunification; previously, West Germany hosted in 1988.
